A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best star wars movie yet!! I seriously loved every single second of it. It was so enjoyable\, the comedic moments were nonstop\, there was incredible character development\, and the franchise TRULY delivered on some epic space battles. I really truly appreciated the pacing of the film. There was so much happening but not to the point to where it was distracting. It allowed your eyes to focus on one element at a time without feeling overwhelmed. I also LOVED the direction they’re taking the story arc of “the force\,” making it feel less exclusive to a select few and instead\, something available to everyone. I am so glad Disney didn’t rehash the old 1 dimensional “random really powerful Jedi\, random super evil Sith Lord\, epic lightsaber battle at the end” storyline. Instead they’re reinventing it for a new generation while honoring past films!! I will also say that this movie in certain ways helps to redeem the often criticized prequel trilogy... in very subtle ways. I thought that was a nice touch. Truly\, a perfectly done Star Wars film.
